mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_speaker (first_name, last_name, title, background, description, banner_url) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{title}, #{background}, #{description}, #{bannerUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE event_speaker SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, title = #{title}, background = #{background}, description = #{description}, banner_url = #{bannerUrl}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_url, img.file_path AS bannerUrl, FROM event_speaker s ORDER BY s.update_time DESC
SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_url, img.file_path AS bannerUrl, FROM event_speaker s WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_id, s.banner_url, FROM event_speaker s WHERE s.id IN
#{id}

SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_id, s.banner_url, FROM event_speaker s WHERE CONCAT(s.first_name, ' ', s.last_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY s.update_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_id, s.banner_url, FROM event_speaker s WHERE s.first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{firstName}, '%') ORDER BY s.update_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_id, s.banner_url, FROM event_speaker s WHERE s.last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{lastName}, '%') ORDER BY s.update_time DESC
